author: markekraus
body: Recent changes to AppVeyor have made TCP port 8082 unavailable. this switches the tests that use 8082 to 8079.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @markekraus Thanks for submitting this.  Merging even though there was a random mac CI failure.

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: @TravisEz13 This probably needs to be merged to the 6.0.0 branch too. Not sure how to approach that.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @markekraus Let me take care of that.  Thanks for the reminder.

title: Fix AppVeyor Failures
